Topic.Title: Why I can't vote for Romney

Message.Msg: What Romney believes! 1 Reducing taxes and regulations will create jobs. This was the policy under Bush that took our country from a budget surplus to a budget deficit and failed to sustain a vital growing economy. Not true. The economy was good until 2007 when the house and senate was controlled by the Democrats. Bill Clinton stated in 1999 that everyone should be able to buy a house and deregulated financing for the housing market. 2. Only those individuals currently covered by medical insurance should be covered for pre-existing conditions. Obama care is a disaster waiting to happen. The Country is broke!! There are 17 new taxes that the middle class will have to pay. Pre-existing conditions will be taken care of by the Romney administration. 3. Competition between the insurance companies will reduce medical costs. Isn’t this what we have today for everyone under the age of 65? Have you premiums gone up and health care improved? The doctors will not accept Medicare because Obama took 716 billion out of medicare to pay for Obama care, so payments to doctors will be less. 65% of doctors are against Obama care. 10 million people will be added and not 1 new doctor will be added to take care of these people. Be prepared for long waiting at the doctors office. 4. The current Social Security system should be changed to allow individuals to invest their retirement funds in the stock market in hopes of getting a higher return. How much money would you have lost if you had sold the stocks in your retirement fund at the bottom of the recession? Not true. The current Social Security system is going broke and needs to be fixed. Romney will fix that 5.You believe that higher income earners (those in the top 10%) should pay taxes at lower rate than Warren Buffet’s secretary or the average wage earner. Warren Buffet’s secretary pays income tax. Warren Buffet pays capital gains tax which is the lower tax bracket 6. Taxes and regulations, not the lack of demand, were the major cause of the recession. The collapse of the housing market caused the recession. That recession was over in June of 2009, 6 months after Obama took office. 7. That the banking and financial industry does not need to be regulated. What do you think caused the housing industry to collapse and the banks to need financial aid from the government to survive? Barney Frank and Chris Dodd were in charge of Banking and Financing industries both Democrats they allowed things to get out of control Bush gets the blame because he was President. 8. Women should be paid less than men for the same job. There is no way of figuring that out. Romney is for equal pay. 9. That the United States should increase its military spending even though the U.S. already spends more on defense than the next 13 countries with the highest defense budgets. We need a strong defense. Obama is weakening our military that is not acceptable 10 That companies are people and should be allowed to make unlimited political contributions without disclosure. They are both doing that. Obama goes one step further, he is getting illegal contributions from over seas. Socialism does not work. I want a free society. My vote goes to Romney

Message.Title: T Yahoo Finance charts - all on one screen - for free
Message.Msg: See all T charts - all on one screen - for free. I use this free standalone lightweight tool (does not install anything on your web browser or computer - this is not an annoying browser toolbar nor an add-in). It is called Yahoo Finance 7 Ways and lets me see all charts (e.g. 1 day, 5 days, 1 month, 3 months, etc.) on the same page for any given security. Do a web search for the website RSTNL and download it from the Downloads section of that website. You can also go to the website CNET, do a search for Yahoo Finance 7 Ways in the downloads section, and download it from there.

Topic.Title: TIME TO PUT BACK-UP POWER &

Message.Msg: I worked for PT&T in the San Diego area. None of our offices were located so as to be damaged by flooding. All were susceptible to earthquake though. They went through the older buildings in the 60's and added reinforcing steel. After the big fire in a C.O. in New york they also went through and made sure all conduits were sealed and added other fire protection measures. The primary cause of natural outages was from fires in the back country. Contractors that didn't call the cable locater would often dig up an underground conduit run.

Topic.Title: Why I can't vote for Romney

Message.Msg: ... “Last Census .. they made 2 personal visits .. a field worker, then a supervisor .. (looking for illegals - chuckles)” – jon, he of tall tales The US Census Bureau has nothing whatsoever to do with U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), which is the investigative arm of The Dept. of Homeland Security (DHS). Are you certain they weren’t from The SPCA investigating your relationship with your dog? “My "mailed in" census form = 1 home & 1 person .. their drive by (seeing the Garage & 4 vehicles) threw ‘red flags’ - so funny.” Yeah, a real knee-slapper, jon. You mailed in your census form, then they drove by and viewed your four vehicles – a 50 c.c. moped with training wheels, your “parts” vehicle, the 1970 Gremlin on cinderblocks next to the outhouse, your rusted out, but only working vehicle – your main ride – a 1985 Yugo GV, with 319,000 miles, complete with dashboard hula girl and an 8-track sound system, aptly named because sometimes Yugo and sometimes you don’t, and last but not least, the Zamboni machine you bought off E-Bay, thinking you could resurface the ice on your pond in July. Wow, jon, four vehicles for just you…we are all duly impressed. You forgot about your motorized skate board and The Scooter you won in a poker game from your 93 year old deaf and blind, invalid neighbor. “me & puppy are really excited ...(chuckles)” My, you ARE excited…we see you humping the dog’s leg. Now that’s a touching tale of a profound bond between a lad and his dog – man’s best friend…and in jon’s case, his ONLY friend. You know, jon, in Old Yeller, they shot the dog in the end. (of the movie, not the dog…they shot him in the head, because tail wounds are seldom mortal.) “I should have hi-lited (SIC) it” – The word is highlight, jon. “…your (SIC) a smart guy…” You’re obviously not!

Topic.Title: Philadelphia Freedom

Message.Msg: Today, my family (wife & kids), and I participated in early voting, here in the People's Republic. The lines were out the door, and snaked around the building. The previous, 1st day of early voting, the lines were even longer. I asked several people what made them turn out. One guy's son was a Custom's Agent. He was feed up with illegal immigration. A couple other had Police in their families, and were tired of all the crime. None appeared to be Barry's supporters. I think that toe sucking guy, former Clinton brain, Dick Morris is right. I'm sensing A Mitt landslide. In the Hood however (where I work), early voting is way down, No lines seen. Some estimates show down 70%. We still could loose though. I understand that a Company in Spain, (headed by George Soros), makes most of the voting machines. We should get a receipt to show how we voted. Just in case there is a recount. Someone remarked yes, like those hanging chads in Florida. I joked, I saw a guy in line with a shirt supporting gay marriage. I believe he was nicknamed Hanging Chad.
